articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢
15 thoughts from a developer working 1.5 years in crypto / blockchain / web3
- Most ppl don't care about NFTs as they're widely used today
- Most ppl will not (should not?) pay to transact in most cases
- Points of centralization will temporarily be needed to provide better UX

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Cami
Ways to support women in crypto instead of pandering on Twitter: 
-Introduce women colleagues in group settings
-Interject when men talk over us
-Invite us to events but NOT to talk about being a woman
-Reach out to @womenbuildweb3 @BoysClubCrypto @She__Fi @she_256 for candidates

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT AlgoveraAI
We're absolutely thrilled to welcome @wise_Tyy onto our team as Community Manager. Ty has much experience in this role at @developer_dao & @edenprotocolxyz. We love the way that he thinks about onboarding & engaging community members. So excited to see what we can build together!
Ty: Happy to share that I've joined @AlgoveraAI as a Community Manager! 🔥
Super excited to decentralize AI by merging data science with web3 and build an epic community 🤝
Big thanks to @developer_dao & @edenprotocolxyz 🙏

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re 
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Rules ℹ️

1. Follow @developer_dao
2. Retweet the first tweet in this thread
3. Submit your meme entry by REPLYING to the first tweet in this thread, and include your wallet address or ENS. 
Note: You must complete all three steps in order to be eligible. 1 entry per-person.
articles.title: Re
